title: Liverpool 1-0 Everton: Did you know?
title_page: Liverpool 1-0 Everton: Did you know? - BBC Sport
maintext:
Liverpool have lost just one of their past 25 home Premier League matches against Everton (W15 D9) - a 2-0 defeat in 2020-21.
This was the Reds' first 1-0 Premier League win at Anfield since May 2023 against Brentford â€“ between that win and tonight, they had won at home with seven different scorelines.
